About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do

Always Grinding

I do a lot of things but the common theme among them all is that they all require constant hard work. I'm very active, and I enjoy running, lifting, and training Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. I'm also a huge fan of MMA, it's the only sport I watch and every Saturday is fight night .

Along with physical pursuits I have nerdier hobbies as well. I enjoy learning and reading about history, particularly American history 1900 and onwards.

I'm a CS major but I didn't enjoy the field until I actually started working on projects and technologies relevant to modern development. Since getting familiar with actual development beyond an academic setting, I've grown to enjoy the process of programming. Recently I've been focused on improving my UI design skills

Above all I thrive on being constantly active both physically and mentally. I know what it means to work hard and work through difficult situations such as recovering from injuries sustained while training. It's this spirit of hard work that I hope to bring to my future employers. Please checkout my LinkedIn or Github and get in touch!
